title: Rallying Cry
description: Librarian's Note: This is a previous alternate cover edition of ASIN B073LR5QZ2.Hisan Linan is a young man of The Borough, Heissia City's impoverished district. His desires are simple. He wants to keep his mother and younger sister safe and fed. He wants his highborn lover coming back for more. He wants to find something new to laugh about every day.What he doesn't want is to take orders from a drug king and kill innocent people. Hisan doesn't have a say in the matter. His childhood friend has forced Hisan down an increasingly dark and violent path. Hisan must devise a way out, but it is critical he do so without putting his loved ones at risk.
author: Anne Bohannon
